item.title: Version 0.58.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.58.0

  • The Control Center window can now be freely resized to fit your workflow.
  • Compact mode includes improved layout polish for a cleaner look.
  • Stability and performance improvements under the hood.

item.title: Version 0.57.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.57.0

  • Control Center now resizes smoothly as content changes.
  • Karaoke-style transcription text is better spaced and easier to read.
  • Settings panels look and feel more polished throughout.
  • Stability and performance improvements under the hood.

item.title: Version 0.56.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.56.0

  • Transcription settings have been redesigned with a cleaner, easier-to-navigate layout.
  • Voice downloads no longer get stuck at 99% — they complete correctly now.
  • Gift codes are now activated more reliably when first redeemed.
  • The Control Center window can now be resized to fit your workflow.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.55.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.55.0

  • Gift codes: redeem a code to unlock Viska Pro or Ultra access.
  • Stability and performance improvements across the app.

item.title: Version 0.54.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.54.0

  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.50.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.50.0

  • New onboarding guide helps you discover output modes, backends, and privacy features at a glance.
  • Upgrade screen now includes a monthly/yearly billing toggle for easy plan comparison.
  • Pro and Ultra feature cards are clearer, making it easier to choose the right plan.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.48.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.48.0

  • New Appearance settings let you customize the visualizer style, colors, and window behavior.
  • Choose from 4 waveform styles, 10 idle animations, and 8 color themes for the recorder.
  • Text-to-speech now includes speed controls and automatic language detection.
  • The app interface is now available in 32 languages.
  • Fixed several text-to-speech reliability and audio playback issues.

item.title: Version 0.47.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.47.0

  • New onboarding experience to help you get started quickly.
  • The app window is now resizable to fit your workflow.
  • Language support now covers 32 languages.
  • Various improvements to subscription setup and billing options.

item.title: Version 0.46.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.46.0

  • New onboarding experience makes getting started with Viska faster and clearer.
  • Use promo code **VISKA15** to unlock a discount on your subscription.
  • Updated feature overview clearly shows what's included in each plan.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.44.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.44.0

  • Labels updated throughout the app — "Notes" replaces "Task," "Pro" replaces "Professional."
  • Simplified the app by removing an unused mode option.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.43.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.43.0

  • Modes now play a sound when you switch between RAW, FLOW, CLARITY, and other transcription modes.
  • Command mode is now available in the Control Center for quicker access to voice commands.
  • Local model selection is now available directly in the floating panel.
  • Voice Mode is now gated by subscription tier, with a new info modal explaining available features.
  • Security and stability improvements across the app.

item.title: Version 0.42.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.42.0

  • Added audio feedback when switching between AI modes.
  • Command mode now remains visible in the Control Center.
  • Recording panel now remembers its own AI mode settings independently.
  • Subscription settings now display a refreshed Pro tier interface.
  • Notes are now protected from accidental cloud sync overwrite.
  • General stability and text-to-speech improvements.

item.title: Version 0.41.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.41.0

  • Improved layout of report pickers for easier reading and selection.
  • Refreshed Pro tier interface with a cleaner, more polished look.
  • Fixed several text-to-speech issues for smoother audio playback.
  • Stability and performance improvements throughout the app.

item.title: Version 0.40.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.40.0

  • New IP Address widget lets you quickly view your local network address.
  • Clock and system monitor widgets now display correctly in preview.
  • Reduced app size by removing an unused audio library.

item.title: Version 0.39.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.39.0

  • The text-to-speech controls have a cleaner, more polished look and feel.
  • The notes editor toolbar is reorganized for easier access to common actions.
  • Voice commands are more reliable and responsive.

item.title: Version 0.38.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.38.0

  • New: Listen to your notes read aloud with a tap, using natural-sounding voices.
  • Choose between your Mac's built-in voices or a downloadable local AI voice engine.
  • Adjust read-aloud speed — slow, normal, or fast — to match your pace.
  • Voice commands are now shorter and more natural; no need to say "Viska" for every action.
  • The Reports editor toolbar is cleaner and easier to navigate.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.37.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.37.0

  • Viska can now read your transcriptions aloud using Text-to-Speech.
  • Choose between local on-device voices or your system's built-in voices.
  • Configure your preferred voice directly from the app settings.

item.title: Version 0.36.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.36.0

  • Settings rows now highlight on hover, making navigation clearer and more responsive.
  • General stability and polish improvements.

item.title: Version 0.35.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.35.0

  • Reorganized the Reports editor toolbar for a cleaner, more intuitive layout.
  • Improved voice commands with better reliability and responsiveness.
  • Refreshed the Settings interface for easier navigation.
  • Fixed text color in the Reports editor for better readability.

item.title: Version 0.34.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.34.0

  • Voice Mode no longer freezes during active sessions.
  • The floating panel is more stable and responsive.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.33.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.33.0

  • Fixed a freeze that could occur when using Voice Mode during transcription.
  • Improved floating panel stability and reliability.

item.title: Version 0.32.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.32.0

  • Voice Mode no longer freezes when activating or stopping transcription.
  • The floating panel is more stable and reliable during use.

item.title: Version 0.31.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.31.0

  • Improved stability of the floating panel for a smoother, more reliable experience.
  • General stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.30.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.30.0

  • Improved stability and reliability of the floating panel.
  • General performance and code quality improvements under the hood.

item.title: Version 0.29.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.29.0

  • Reports editor now supports text color, highlighting, and undo/redo for easier editing.
  • Word-by-word playback highlighting now stays accurately in sync with the audio.
  • Selecting multiple items in your Library works correctly again.
  • Offline mode now clearly indicates when AI reformatting requires Apple Intelligence.
  • Stability and performance improvements throughout the app.

item.title: Version 0.28.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.28.0

  • Word-by-word highlighting during transcription playback is now accurate and reliable.
  • Selecting multiple items in the Library works correctly again.
  • Reports view includes layout and usability improvements.
  • The floating panel has been refined for a smoother experience.
  • Stability and reliability improvements under the hood.

item.title: Version 0.27.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.27.0

  • Record audio directly from the Reports window.
  • Rename reports inline without opening a separate dialog.
  • Pick your preferred AI model right from the Reports view.

item.title: Version 0.26.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.26.0

  • Record audio directly from the Reports window for faster report creation.
  • Rename reports inline without opening a separate dialog.
  • Choose which AI model to use when generating reports.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.25.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.25.0

  • Record audio directly from the Reports window for faster transcription workflows.
  • Rename reports inline without leaving the window.
  • Apply AI formatting to any selected text within a report.
  • Manage variables directly inside the Reports window.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.24.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.24.0

  • New: Create professional reports from your transcriptions using built-in AI templates.
  • Reports sync automatically across your devices via iCloud.
  • Choose from multiple report styles to fit your workflow and content type.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.23.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.23.0

  • New: Professional Reports — create polished documents from your recordings using AI-powered templates.
  • Reports sync across your devices automatically via iCloud.
  • Export reports to share or archive them outside the app.
  • Use voice commands while recording without stopping your dictation.
  • Chain multiple voice commands together in a single spoken phrase.

item.title: Version 0.22.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.22.0

  • Use voice commands while recording is in progress, without stopping.
  • Issue multiple voice commands in a single phrase for faster control.
  • Subscription plan benefits are now clearer and easier to understand.
  • Triggers settings have a simpler, cleaner layout.
  • Stability improvements and minor bug fixes for voice mode.

item.title: Version 0.21.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.21.0

  • Voice commands now work reliably while a recording is in progress.
  • Fixed an issue where the floating panel could appear behind other windows.
  • Settings interface has been cleaned up for a more polished experience.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.20.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.20.0

  • Wake word "stop" command now reliably ends recording every time.
  • Dictation is more accurate and consistent across sessions.
  • Fixed the floating panel overlapping other windows unexpectedly.
  • App updates now download and install correctly.

item.title: Version 0.19.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.19.0

  • Wake word detection is now more reliable and responds correctly to stop commands.
  • Dictation mode has been improved for smoother, more accurate voice input.
  • Fixed an issue where the floating panel could overlap other windows unexpectedly.
  • Quick actions in the floating panel are easier to access and use.
  • Visual dividers in the Control Center now better separate sections for clarity.

item.title: Version 0.18.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.18.0

  • You can now customize quick actions to match your personal workflow.
  • Wake word detection is more reliable and responds consistently.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.17.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.17.0

  • Say "Hey Viska" more reliably — wake word detection now handles all languages and regions correctly.
  • New voice commands added for more hands-free control of the app.
  • Wake word detection recovers faster when the audio pipeline has a hiccup.
  • Minor visual tweaks to the floating recorder panel for a cleaner look.

item.title: Version 0.16.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.16.0

  • More voice commands available — control the app hands-free with new spoken shortcuts.
  • "Hey Viska" wake word detection is now more reliable and responsive.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.15.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.15.0

  • "Hey Viska" wake word detection is now more reliable and handles more speech variations.
  • The recording panel now shows clear color-coded status icons so you always know what the app is doing.
  • Voice commands now cover more settings — switch AI mode, output style, and more by speaking.
  • Silence detection automatically kicks in after a wake word trigger, so recording stops when you finish speaking.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.14.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.14.0

  • "Hey Viska" now activates more reliably with consistent wake word detection across all system languages.
  • Visual status indicators clearly show when Viska is listening, recording, or dictating.
  • Voice command settings are cleaner and easier to understand at a glance.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.13.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.13.0

  • Say "Hey Viska" to start recording hands-free, without touching your keyboard.
  • New voice commands let you control the app entirely with your voice.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.12.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.12.0

  • Say "Hey Viska" to start recording hands-free — no clicking required.
  • Use your voice to control the app: start, stop, or cancel recordings naturally.
  • New visual feedback shows when Viska is listening or transcribing.
  • Wake word detection works even when the app is in the background.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.10.0
item.description: What's New in 0.10.0

item.title: Version 0.9.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.9.0

  • New sections added to the Control Center info panel for quicker access to key details.
  • The Conversation toggle can now always be shown, regardless of other settings.
  • Improved AI prompt names for better clarity and consistency.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.8.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.8.0

  • Push-to-Talk keyboard shortcuts now work correctly after a recent regression.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.7.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.7.0

  • Connect Viska to OpenClaw and chat with an AI assistant directly from your menu bar.
  • AI responses can be read aloud automatically during OpenClaw conversations.
  • OpenClaw connection token syncs across your Macs via iCloud — no manual setup needed.
  • New onboarding step lets you test your microphone and set your hotkeys before you start.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.6.0

  • Notes and Journal sidebars are now resizable — drag to adjust the width to your liking.
  • Add new journal entries directly from the calendar header with the new + button.
  • Notes search bar now includes a quick-add button for faster note creation.
  • Cloud sync now fetches your latest data immediately when the app launches.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.5.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.5.0

  • Customize up to 4 Quick Actions in the Control Center for one-tap access to your favorite features.
  • Presets now save per-preset settings for Translation, Conversation Mode, Date Context, and Build & Verify.
  • Notes and Journal sidebars are now resizable — drag to your preferred width.
  • A subtle usage gauge appears when you're approaching your weekly limit.
  • Expanded in-app help for the Screenshot Gallery with tips on filtering, sorting, and sharing.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.4.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.4.0

  • Chat with an AI assistant directly inside Viska using the new built-in AI chat.
  • Send any transcription straight to your Notion workspace with one click.
  • Control Viska hands-free with six new Apple Shortcuts actions.
  • Format selected text from any app via the new Viska option in the macOS Services menu.
  • The record button in compact Control Center is now wider and easier to click.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.1

  • Chat with an AI assistant directly inside Viska using the new built-in AI chat feature.
  • AI chat now opens in a dedicated window instead of a floating panel.
  • The record button in compact Control Center is now wider and easier to click.
  • Stability and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.0

  • iCloud sync is now reliable — your transcriptions and data sync correctly across all your devices.
  • The app is now fully translated in 31 languages, with no missing or broken text.
  • Stability and performance improvements throughout the app.

item.title: Version 0.1.3
item.description:
What's New in 0.1.3

  • Control Center can now stay on top of other windows with the new Always on Top option.
  • Long-pressing dials and buttons in Control Center now triggers quick secondary actions.
  • AI mode indicators now use clean icons instead of text badges throughout the app.
  • Settings are better organized with improved grouping, layout, and icon consistency.
  • Stability and visual polish improvements across the app.

item.title: Version 0.1.2
item.description:
What's New in 0.1.2

  • Device model icons now appear in filter menus for easier browsing.
  • Transcription history now tracks which device each recording was made on.
  • Control Center header buttons auto-hide to keep the interface clean and focused.
  • General UI polish and stability improvements.

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.1.1

  • Your transcription history now shows which device was used to make each recording.
  • Visual polish and layout refinements throughout the app for a cleaner look.
  • General stability and performance improvements.
